column4: do I have to login as root to install stuff? I remember needing to when I tried Debian, but I never set up a root account during the Ubuntu installation
well, I mean, I downloaded a program that came as a tarball, followed the instructions on the Ubuntu site on installing tarballs, and nothing happened
so you tried to compile from source?
i believe the last step in the process ("make install" or "checkinstall") requires root, but configure and make don't
